TEI.2.document_title: Simpson and Quarles to Stephen F. Austin, 02-12-1817

barker_notes.barker_summary: Stephen F. Austin & Co. bought of Simpson & Quarles.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 300

div1.p: Stephen F. Austin & Co. bought of Simpson & Quarles.

1 Ream Best foolscap paper___________________________ $7.50
1 do do Red Letter do _____________________ 7.00
5 1 Ol Menth P. P. [1 ounce oil of peppermint]_______ 2.00
$16.50
